p: The acquired image will then undergo pre-processing to convert it into an appropriate format before further analysis. Pre-processing tasks may include exposure correction, color balancing, noise reduction, sharpness increase or orientation change. Next, the process of feature detection and matching as well as segmentation is performed on the pre-processed image to extract the object or region of interest. Finally, the subject of interest is analyzed with proper analysis algorithms in the respective area of application [ 9].
